DOC.brief_summary: `` Pharmacologic Study Oseltamivir Healthy Volunteers '' Phase I study 8 32 adult healthy Thai volunteer randomize one four drug dos regimens within 4 visit . The study conduct Bangkok Hospital Tropical Diseases Research Unit , Faculty Tropical Medicine , commence enrol healthy volunteer 23 November 2006 . The duration study expect approximately four month . The goal study assess use load dose oseltamivir concomitant use probenecid characterize pharmacokinetic property oseltamivir Thai subject .
